title: Red Pin
description: Previous cover edition for ASIN B078MBZCZMFor alternate cover edition see hereSunny's stepmother has disappeared, and finding her is now Sunny's number-one priority. Luckily for her, her best mate Annabel is in on the secret and now a part of The Agency team, determined to destroy Hellix. But Annabel's got her own murderous agenda. Can Sunny find her stepmother, and reign Annabel in?
author: Lauretta Hignett
